parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns name of currently used goggles (for NVGoggles use [[hmd]]).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''goggles''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_goggles = [[goggles]] assaultDiver; //G_Diving
</code>
 
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_goggles = [[goggles]] reconTeamLeader; //G_Shades_Black
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeGoggles]], [[addGoggles]], [[hmd]], [[headgear]], [[binocular]], [[getDiverState]]
</value></part></template></root>
